scripts.alpha: yarn run alpha:local && yarn run deploy
scripts.alpha:local: yarn run swap:alpha && firebase use alpha
scripts.beta: yarn run beta:local && yarn run deploy
scripts.beta:local: yarn run swap:beta && firebase use beta
scripts.clean: yarn run clean:dist && yarn run clean:tsbuildinfo
scripts.deploy: yarn run deploy:rules && yarn run deploy:functions
scripts.deploy:rules: yarn run deploy:rules:database && yarn run deploy:rules:firestore && yarn run deploy:rules:storage
scripts.env:set: test -f env.json && firebase functions:config:unset env && firebase functions:config:set env="$(cat env.json)"
scripts.env:set:all: yarn run env:set:alpha && yarn run env:set:beta && yarn run env:set:main
scripts.env:set:alpha: yarn run alpha:local && yarn run swap:alpha:env && yarn run env:set
scripts.env:set:beta: yarn run beta:local && yarn run swap:beta:env && yarn run env:set
scripts.env:set:main: yarn run main:local && yarn run swap:main:env && yarn run env:set
scripts.firebase:alpha: yarn run alpha:local && yarn run env:get && yarn run start
scripts.firebase:beta: yarn run beta:local && yarn run env:get && yarn run start
scripts.firebase:main: yarn run main:local && yarn run env:get && yarn run start
scripts.main: yarn run main:local && yarn run deploy
scripts.main:local: yarn run swap:main && firebase use main
scripts.test: firebase emulators:exec --only firestore 'jest --silent && yarn run coverage:rules'
scripts.test:watch: firebase emulators:exec --only firestore 'jest --watch && yarn run coverage:rules'
scripts.typescript: yarn run clean && yarn run tsc && yarn run tscpaths
